meanings.definition: A painting, typically an altarpiece, consisting of multiple panels hinged together.
meanings.sent1: The church displayed beautiful polyptychs depicting religious scenes.
meanings.sent2: The art gallery featured an ancient polyptychs showcasing intricate details.
meanings.sent3: The polyptychs in the museum seemed to come alive at night, telling stories to each other.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a polyptychs, each memory a panel connected to the next.
meanings.sent5: The artist's use of vibrant colors made the polyptychs unforgettable.

meanings.definition: A collection of panels or sections, especially in a work of art or literature.
meanings.sent1: The graphic novel was divided into polyptychs, each revealing a different aspect of the story.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed a series of polyptychs that captured different emotions.
meanings.sent3: The polyptychs of poems on the wall seemed to whisper secrets to those who listened closely.
meanings.sent4: Her heart was like a polyptychs, each emotion a panel forming the whole picture of her feelings.
meanings.sent5: The polyptychs of the novel created a visual journey for the readers.
